items.8: Second order I place with Mathias, and it always goes extremely well, very good communication, speed and efficiency, and a result beyond my expectations. I recommend Mathias, you will not be disappointed with the result!
items.9: Good work! Mathias migrated our website to the new host very quickly. Fully recommend.
items.10: Another great result with Mathias! Always professional, proactive and 100% communicative, keeping you informed of progress, a pleasure!

aboutme.description: During my studies, I worked in various sectors such as Uber Eats, temp work, and as a salesperson in Angers and Tours, in northern France. Then, I moved to the south, 30 minutes from Spain, to pursue a one-year web development apprenticeship. At that time, I only knew HTML and CSS, but I quickly gained complete autonomy, creating pixel-perfect WordPress sites without themes or builders. I also learned to debug WordPress-related issues, manage hosting, and perform migrations. Thanks to this experience, I was able to start freelancing, which allowed me to begin learning ReactJS. With perseverance, I joined Radio Analyzer in Aalborg, Denmark, as a ReactJS front-end developer, where I actively contribute to developing innovative solutions for their SaaS products.

radioAnalyzer.title: Radio Analyzer
radioAnalyzer.description: SaaS product development at Radio Analyzer (internal software and client solutions) for the global radio industry. Creation of ReactJS interfaces with advanced charts, data virtualization, and complex filtering systems. Close collaboration with the backend team for API integration and continuous product improvement.

freelance.title: Freelance
freelance.description: As a freelancer, development of showcase websites, e-commerce sites, and applications using WordPress and ReactJS. Complete project management from design to production, bug fixing, and site migrations. Focus on performance and user experience.

kori.title: Kori
kori.description: WordPress Developer at Kori, specialized in custom website creation. Development of custom themes from scratch with pixel-perfect integration of Figma and XD designs. Implementation of specific features and maintenance of existing sites.

vendeur.title: Sales Associate
vendeur.description: Multi-skilled sales associate in a garden center: shelf stocking, plant maintenance, customer advice, and creation of promotional displays.

vendeurPolyvalent.title: Sales Associate
vendeurPolyvalent.description: Multi-skilled sales associate in a garden center: shelf stocking, plant maintenance, customer advice, and creation of promotional displays.

uberEats.title: Uber Eats
uberEats.description: Uber Eats delivery driver: food delivery in compliance with food safety standards, with a focus on customer satisfaction. Development of excellent city knowledge and ability to handle unexpected situations.

obandito.title: O'bandito
obandito.description: O'bandito is a web platform connecting musicians with event organizers, developed over 4 weeks as part of a professional certification project. Built collaboratively with a team of 3 developers (2 frontend, 1 backend).

moviesFinder.title: Movies finder
moviesFinder.description: A movie search platform built with React, leveraging an external API for real-time movie data. Features dynamic search, movie details display, and responsive design using useEffect and useSWR for efficient data fetching.

thishan.title: Maison Thishan
thishan.description: A fully custom WordPress e-commerce website built from scratch for an independent perfumer. Features bespoke theme development, custom product catalog, and tailored checkout process without using pre-made themes.

tp66.title: TP66
tp66.description: Redesign of the website for the largest construction company in the Eastern Pyrenees

kasa.title: Kasa
kasa.description: Kasa is my first ReactJS project aimed at showcasing different apartments

contact.title: Let's Work Together.
